description: '''Mutha's Day Out''' was an American [[rock music|rock]] & [[heavy metal music|heavy metal]] band formed in November 1991 from the town of [[Batesville, Arkansas]]. The band consisted of: Mikal Moore (vocals), Brice Stephens (vocals), Chuck Schaaf (guitar), Jeff Morgan (bass), and Rodney Moffitt (drums). They released one album, ''My Soul is Wet'', in 1993 for [[Chrysalis Records]] before breaking up.
